price: Mbega ababangikanyamana, boba baremwe n’ubusa ata cabaremye! Canke boba bariremye! Usangwa bataremwe n’ubusa canke ngo bireme, nibamenye rero ko Imana Allah ari Yo Yabaremye, n’uko ari Yo rero, Ikwiye gusengwa Itabangikanywa.
arabic: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ

meta.transliteration: am khuliqū min ghayri shayin am humu al-khāliqūna
